mapper.update: update GQPTZ_ZYJCSJB set SCSJ = #{scsj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GCZX = #{gczx,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, GCZY = #{gczy,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, GCZH = #{gczh,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, BQXWY = #{bqxwy,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, BQYWY = #{bqywy,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, BQHWY = #{bqhwy,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, BQXFXWY = #{bqxfxwy,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, BQYFXWY = #{bqyfxwy,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, BQHFXWY = #{bqhfxwy,jdbcType=NUMERIC} where GQPBH = #{gqpbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and JCDBH = #{jcdbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and JCSJ = #{jcsj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select GQPBH, JCDBH, JCSJ, SCSJ, GCZX, GCZY, GCZH, BQXWY, BQYWY, BQHWY, BQXFXWY, BQYFXWY, BQHFXWY from GQPTZ_ZYJCSJB
